article.title: Major Decision Points in Labrary Automation
article.author: Veaner, Allen B.
article.text: This article is based on a longer, more detailed paper prepared for the 1970 Midwinter Meeting of the Association of Research Libraries.. Readers interested in the complete test (with bibliography) are referred to the Minutes of the ARL meeting.. The author discusses automation in the context of the management, facilities, and system requirements for large research libraries..
